thread.title: variable values

comments.text: do displayed values always reset to zero once everyone leaves? is it possible for say a counter displaying 6 to stay at 6 when anyone returns to an area?
sadly, area variables are synched to the host. theres probably a convaluted way around this, but none comes to mind
i thought as much. thanks for getting back anyway giodude...
you can use "... then is person.gold = 10", which will be specific to that person and remembered for next time they return
thanks philipp. i wanted the counter to increase when people leave, so if they came back they would see the counter at what it showed last for them, but they wouldn't see the new
wow, didnt know thats how it works
you could make cookies for each bit in the value to store in the area and reset the variables to your cookie count
yoof yes that sounds correct -- if by counter you think of a "personal experience" type counter (person.* variables are persistent, but cannot be increased by others while ur gone)
